titleInfo.title: Help Build a New Christian Brothers College

mods.abstract: Billboards promoting the building of the new Christian Brothers College were posted at ten locations in Memphis from April 26 through May 5. Locations were at: Linden and Turley; Southern and Baltimore; Jefferson and Neely; 2430 Summer; 507 South Main; Poplar and Highland; Iowa east of Main; 669 Madison; Second and Adams; and 1580 Lamar.
